participant_1.background:
I love using my camcorder to film my friends and family.
Every Sunday, I sing in the choir and then go for a drive to clear my mind.
I help my grandparents with their daily activities.
i take martial arts after school.
I have a passion for helping couples create the perfect wedding day.

participant_2.background:
I used to wear a suit every day to work.
i own a german shepard.
i am an art teacher.
i like soccer.
I like to dye my hair pink because it's a fun and playful color that matches my personality.

content.text: Hello, how is your day going?
Hello! It is going well, thank you! How about yours?
It is going great, thank you for asking! I am just getting ready to go for a drive to clear my mind.
Sounds like you have a great day planned! What do you like to do on your days off?
I like to spend time with my friends and family, and I also love to film them with my camcorder! I also sing in the choir every Sunday and then go for a drive to clear my mind.
That sounds like a really full and active life! I used to wear a suit every day to work, but now I am an art teacher. I also like to play soccer and have a German Shepherd!
That is so cool! I love to watch soccer, but I have never played before. I would love to learn sometime!
You should! It is a lot of fun and a great way to stay active.
I will definitely look into it! I think my grandma would love to come to a soccer game with me!
That would be so sweet! She would probably love to see you play!
Thank you for the suggestion! I am really excited to learn more about soccer.
You're welcome! I am glad I could help!
